title: Anas Sarwar – 2022 Comments on Division
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anas Sarwar, the leader of Scottish Labour, on Twitter on 10 October 2022.
content:
You don’t beat division with more division.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

There isn’t a majority for a referendum next year.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

There isn’t a majority for independence.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

There is a majority for change – in Scotland and across the UK.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

It’s time for change – it’s time for Labour.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
